name: Secret Seeker
description:
Objects are hidden in the most unexpected places. Find them all and solve the puzzle.
Can you solve all the riddles and become the best player?
Try to find all the items.
Test your concentration, speed and IQ level.
The faster the speed is, the higher IQ points you get.
Improve your search skills by exploring unobvious places.
In this game you could be a true detective. Try it out and enjoy!
